title: Vast Data builds momentum as cloud-native infrastructure shifts toward agentic AI
description: The next stage of cloud-native infrastructure is employing Kubernetes as an orchestration platform for AI workloads, with an emphasis on supporting autonomous agents. Vast Data Inc. is positioning itself within that ecosystem, as a cloud-native AI infrastruct…
